rows.label: qst702605_msg0002
rows.name:
So you just want me to fix up your
Fortune-Findermatron 4000, is that it?

rows.label: qst702605_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll give it a go, but I'm not really good
at stuff that doesn't involve bugs.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0004
rows.name:
If that's OK, then I'm happy
to take a look.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0007
rows.name: No, he should stick to bugs

rows.label: qst702605_msg0008
rows.name:
Finished! I customized it a little to
my personal tastes.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0009
rows.name: And I renamed it the Golden Scorpion.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0011
rows.name:
Why don't you go try it out in
the Dannagh Desert now?

rows.label: qst702605_msg0012
rows.name:
Probs for the best. I'm pretty busy.
Why not find someone who's more of
an expert on things like this than I am?

rows.label: qst702605_msg0101
rows.name: How d'you like the Golden Scorpion?

rows.label: qst702605_msg0102
rows.name:
If you haven't tried it out yet,
get yourselves to the Dannagh Desert
and give it a go!
